item.title: Sheets datetime converter
item.description: Sheets datetime converter Snippet Run it Relations Sheets datetime converter Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * Converts date-time to numeric Sheets format * * @param {(number|Date)} date JS Date or time in ms * @param {number} timezoneOffset * @return {number} Google Sheets Date number */ function toGoogleSheetsDateNumber(date, timezoneOffset) { const _date = new Date(date); timezoneOffset = timezoneOffset || _date.

item.title: Date range iterator
item.description: Date range iterator Snippet Run it Date range iterator Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /* exported makeDatesRangeIterator */ /** * * @param {Date} start * @param {Date} end * @param {number} step ms */ function* makeDatesRangeIterator_(start, end, step = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) { const _start = new Date(start); let _iterationCount = 0; while (_start <= end) { _iterationCount++; yield _start; _start.

item.title: Column names to numbers and vice versa
item.description: Column names to numbers and vice versa Define Base 26 ABC Snippet Test The short list of the first 250 numbers Art Column names to numbers and vice versa Define Base 26 ABC A26 = a26 = 110 B26 = b26 = 210 C26 = c26 = 310 … Y26 = y26 = 2510 Z26 = z26 = 2610 AA26 = aa26 = 2710 … ZZ26 = zz26 = 70210 There are several base 26 types.
